articles.title: 16 Arrested For Robberies Targetting Indian, Asian Jewellery Stores In US - NDTV
articles.description: A total of 16 members of a major crime ring have been arrested for allegedly committing multiple violent armed robberies targeting Indian and other Asian jewellery stores across four East Coast US states in a span of one year.
articles.content:
The gang disguised in dark clothing, masks, and gloves, armed with a gun.
